<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_dev_tool_operation"><u_dev_tool_operation action="DELETE"><sys_class_name>u_dev_tool_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-21 14:43:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>841739752fb90110a8ce2b5df699b6d4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Sleep 30 Seconds</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Tools 2.0" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Tools 2.0">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_dev_tool_operation_841739752fb90110a8ce2b5df699b6d4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-21 14:43:39</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_condition/><u_conditional>false</u_conditional><u_description/><u_name>Sleep 30 Seconds</u_name><u_script><![CDATA[var currentRecord = current; //Current GlideRecord
//Each operation input is available as a variable witin this script.
//Ex: var userName = name

//Enter Code Below

var output = {
	userName: gs.getUserName(),
	userId: gs.getUserID(),
	scope: gs.getCurrentApplicationId()
};
gs.info(JSON.stringify(output));

gs.sleep(30000);

result = output;]]></u_script><u_table>global</u_table></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_2ce43ec22fd10110a8ce2b5df699b618
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.DevOperation</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>DevOperation</name><script><![CDATA[var DevOperation = Class.create();
DevOperation.prototype = {
	initialize: function (operationGr) {
		if (operationGr) {
			if (typeof operationGr === "string") {
				operationGr = this._getGlideRecordWithId(operationGr);
			}
			if (operationGr + "" === "[object GlideRecord]") {
				this._setFromGr(operationGr);
			} else if (operationGr + "" === "[object Object]") {
				this._setFromModel(operationGr);
			}
		}
	},

	execute: function (gr, view) {
		if (this.operationGr && gr) {
			this.output = new DevOperationOutput();
			this.output.script = this.script;
			this.output.setStartTime();
			var inputs = {};
			inputs = this._setInputs();
			if (!inputs) {
				return;
			}
			if(this.type === 'basic'){
				while(gr.next()){
					if (this.isRecordCompatible(gr)) {
						this._runScript(this.operationGr, gr, view, inputs);
					} else {
						gs.info('developer_operations (execute): ' + this.name + ' Operation Execution was skipped for GR: ' + gr.getUniqueValue() + ' because it did not meet the condition requirement.');
					}
				}
			}else if(this.type === 'list'){
				this._runScript(this.operationGr, gr, view, inputs);
			}
			
			this.output.setEndTime();
			this.output.insertScriptExecution();
			return this.output;
		} else {
			gs.warn('Developer Tools: DevOperation (execute) could not execute. Operation record not specified');
		}
	},
	
	executeAsync: function(tableName, sysIds, filter, view){
		if (!tableName) {
            gs.info("developer_operation (executeAsync): Can't start a new job. Must provide a valid operation table name");
            return false;
        }

        this.output = new DevOperationOutput();
        this.output.setStartTime();

        var worker = new GlideScriptedProgressWorker();
        worker.setProgressName("Developer Operations Job (" + gs.getUserID() + ")");
        worker.setName('DevProcessor');

        worker.addNonEscapedParameter(JSON.stringify(this));
        worker.addNonEscapedParameter(tableName);
        worker.addNonEscapedParameter(JSON.stringify(sysIds));
		worker.addNonEscapedParameter(filter);

        worker.setBackground(true);

        worker.start();
        var progressWorkerId = worker.getProgressID();
        if(progressWorkerId){
            this.output.addResult('basic', 'success', 'New Job (' + progressWorkerId +') was created and is processing in the background.', this._getProgressWorker(progressWorkerId));
        }else{
            this.output.addResult('basic', 'error', 'No background job was created.', null);
        }
        
        this.output.setEndTimeAsync();
	},

	isTableCompatible: function (tableName) {
		if (this.table === 'global' || tableName === this.table) {
			return true;
		}
		if (tableName) {
			var tableUtils = new TableUtils(this.table);
			var tableArrayList = tableUtils.getTableExtensions();
			gs.include("j2js");
			var tableArray = j2js(tableArrayList);
			if (tableArray.indexOf(tableName) > -1) {
				return true;
			}
		}
		return false;
	},

	isRecordCompatible: function (gr) {
		if (!this.recordCount) {
			this.recordCount = {
				total: 0,
				valid: 0
			};
		}
		this.recordCount.total++;
		if (this.isConditional && this.condition) {
			if (GlideFilter.checkRecord(gr, this.condition)) {
				this.recordCount.valid++;
				return true;
			}
		} else {
			this.recordCount.valid++;
			return true;
		}
	},

	isFilterCompatible: function(tableName, filter) {
		this.recordCount = {
			total: 0,
			valid: 0
		};

		var ga = new GlideAggregate(tableName);
		ga.addEncodedQuery(filter);
		//ga.addEncodedQuery(this.condition);
		ga.addAggregate('COUNT');
		ga.query();
		while(ga.next()){
			this.recordCount.total = ga.getAggregate('COUNT');
		}
		ga.addEncodedQuery(this.condition);
		ga.query();
		while(ga.next()){
			this.recordCount.valid = ga.getAggregate('COUNT');
		}

	},

	getImplementationScript: function(sysIds, tableName){
		var operationScript = new DevOperationScript();
		operationScript.buildExecuteScript(this.script, this.inputs);
		operationScript.buildProcessScript(tableName, this.inputs, sysIds, '');
		var impScript = operationScript.reportFunctions();
		impScript += "\n\nprocess();";
		return impScript
	},

	//Internal Functions
	_setFromGr: function (operationGr) {
		this.sysId = operationGr.getUniqueValue();
		this.name = operationGr.getValue("u_name");
		this.table = operationGr.getValue("u_table");
		this.isConditional = (operationGr.getValue("u_conditional") == "1");
		this.sysScope = this._getReferenceField("sys_scope", operationGr);
		this.active = (operationGr.getValue("u_active") == "1");
		this.description = operationGr.getValue("u_description");
		this.condition = operationGr.getValue("u_condition");
		this.script = operationGr.getValue("u_script");
		this.inputs = this._getInputs();
		this.type = operationGr.getValue("u_type");
		this.operationGr = operationGr;
	},

	_setFromModel: function (model) {
		for (var key in model) {
			if (key === 'inputs') {
				for (var i = 0; i < model[key].length; i++) {
					model[key][i] = new DevOperationInput(model[key][i]);
				}
			}
			if (key === 'output') {
				for (var o = 0; o < model[key].length; o++) {
					model[key][o] = new DevOperationOutput(model[key][o]);
				}
			}
			this[key] = model[key];
		}
		if (model.sysId) {
			this.operationGr = this._getGlideRecordWithId(model.sysId);
		}
	},

	_getInputs: function () {
		var inputs = [];
		if (this.sysId) {
			var inputGr = new GlideRecord('u_dev_tool_operation_input');
			inputGr.addQuery('u_dev_tool_operation', this.sysId);
			inputGr.orderBy('u_order');
			inputGr.query();
			while (inputGr.next()) {
				inputs.push(new DevOperationInput(inputGr));
			}
		}
		return inputs;
	},

	_getReferenceField: function (columnName, operationGr) {
		var returnObj = {};
		if (columnName) {
			returnObj.value = operationGr.getValue(columnName);
			returnObj.displayValue = operationGr.getDisplayValue(columnName);
		}
		return returnObj;
	},

	_getGlideRecordWithId: function (id) {
		var operationGr = new GlideRecord("u_dev_tool_operation");
		if (operationGr.get(id)) {
			return operationGr;
		}
	},

	_setInputs: function () {
		var userInputs = {};
		if(this.inputs){
			for (var i = 0; i < this.inputs.length; i++) {
				var input = this.inputs[i];
				if (!input.userValue && input.required) {
					gs.warn('Developer Tools: DevOperation (execute) could not execute ' + input.inputLabel + ' is a required input for operation ' + this.name);
					return false;
				}
				userInputs[input.inputName] = input.getUserValue();
			}
		}
		return userInputs;
	},

	_runScript: function (operationGr, gr, view, inputs) {
		try {
			var evaluator = new GlideScopedEvaluator();
			for (var key in inputs) {
				evaluator.putVariable(key, inputs[key]);
			}
			evaluator.putVariable('current', gr);
			evaluator.putVariable('view', view);
			evaluator.putVariable('result', '');
			evaluator.evaluateScript(operationGr, 'u_script');
			var result = this._parseResult(evaluator.getVariable('result'));

			this.output.addResult(result.type, 'success', result.value, gr);
		} catch (e) {
			this.output.addResult('error', e.getMessage(), gr);
		}
	},
	
	_getProgressWorker: function(sysId){
        var progressWorkerGr = new GlideRecord('sys_progress_worker');
        if(progressWorkerGr.get(sysId)){
            return progressWorkerGr;
        }
    },

	_parseResult: function(result){
		var response = {
			type: 'basic',
			value: result
		};
		if(response.value + "" === "[object GlideRecord]"){
			response.value = {
				link: response.value.getLink(),
				display: response.value.getDisplayValue(),
				gr: response.value
			};
			response.type = 'link';
		}
		return response;
	},

	type: 'DevOperation'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-28 17:19:42</sys_created_on><sys_id>2ce43ec22fd10110a8ce2b5df699b618</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DevOperation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2ce43ec22fd10110a8ce2b5df699b618</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-29 17:28:48</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_11f5a37b2f53111003377f572799b6d2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="DELETE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.DevOperationScriptExecution</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>DevOperationScriptExecution</name><script><![CDATA[var DevOperationScriptExecution = Class.create();
DevOperationScriptExecution.prototype = {
    initialize: function(scriptExecutionGr) {
		if(scriptExecutionGr){
            if(typeof scriptExecutionGr === "string"){
                scriptExecutionGr = this._getGlideRecordWithId(scriptExecutionGr);
            }
			if(scriptExecutionGr + "" === "[object GlideRecord]"){
				this.setFromGr(scriptExecutionGr);
			}else if(scriptExecutionGr + "" === "[object Object]"){
				this.setFromModel(scriptExecutionGr);
			}
		}
    },
	
	setFromGr: function(scriptExecutionGr){
		this.sysId = scriptExecutionGr.getUniqueValue();
		this.result = scriptExecutionGr.getValue("result");
		this.executedBy = this._getReferenceField("executed_by", scriptExecutionGr);
		this.started = scriptExecutionGr.getValue("started");
		this.finished = scriptExecutionGr.getValue("finished");
		this.script = scriptExecutionGr.getValue("script");  
	},

	setFromModel: function(model){
		for(var key in model){
			this[key] = model[key];
		}
	},

	insert: function(){
		var scriptExecutionGr = new GlideRecord("sys_script_execution_history");
		scriptExecutionGr.initialize();
		scriptExecutionGr = this._assignGlideRecordValues(scriptExecutionGr);
		this.sysId = scriptExecutionGr.insert();
	},
		
	update: function(){
		var scriptExecutionGr = new GlideRecord("sys_script_execution_history");
		if(scriptExecutionGr.get(this.sysId)){
			scriptExecutionGr = this._assignGlideRecordValues(scriptExecutionGr);
			scriptExecutionGr.update();
		}
	},

	deleteRecord: function(){
		var scriptExecutionGr = new GlideRecord("sys_script_execution_history");
		if(scriptExecutionGr.get(this.sysId)){
			scriptExecutionGr.deleteRecord();
		}
	},

	//Internal Functions
	
	_getReferenceField: function(columnName, scriptExecutionGr){
		var returnObj = {};
		if(columnName){
			returnObj.id = scriptExecutionGr.getValue(columnName);
			returnObj.displayValue = scriptExecutionGr.getDisplayValue(columnName);
		}
		return returnObj;
	},

	_assignGlideRecordValues: function(scriptExecutionGr){
		scriptExecutionGr.result = this.result;
		scriptExecutionGr.executed_by = this.executedBy.sysId;
		scriptExecutionGr.started = this.started;
		scriptExecutionGr.finished = this.finished;
		scriptExecutionGr.script = this.script;
        return scriptExecutionGr;
	},

    _getGlideRecordWithId: function(id){
        var scriptExecutionGr = new GlideRecord("sys_script_execution_history");
        if(scriptExecutionGr.get(id)){
            return scriptExecutionGr;
        }
    },
				
    type: 'DevOperationScriptExecution'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-28 13:40:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>11f5a37b2f53111003377f572799b6d2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DevOperationScriptExecution</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_11f5a37b2f53111003377f572799b6d2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-28 13:45:30</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

//Each operation input is available as a variable witin this script.
//Ex: var userName = name

//Enter Code Below
if(currentRecord.getValue('active')){
	var active = currentRecord.getValue('active') == '1';
	var newActive = !active;
	currentRecord.active = newActive;
	currentRecord.update();
	gs.info(currentRecord.getDisplayValue() + ':   ' + active + ' > ' + newActive);
}

result = currentRecord.getDisplayValue() + ':   ' + active + ' > ' + newActive;]]></u_script><u_table>sys_metadata</u_table></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_dev_tool_operation"><u_dev_tool_operation action="DELETE"><sys_class_name>u_dev_tool_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-11 13:59:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>000d426a2f210110a8ce2b5df699b625</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get GlideRecord JSON</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Tools 2.0" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Tools 2.0">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_dev_tool_operation_000d426a2f210110a8ce2b5df699b625</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-11 14:01:19</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_condition/><u_conditional>false</u_conditional><u_description>Returns a JSON objejct of the current GlideRecord</u_description><u_name>Get GlideRecord JSON</u_name><u_script><![CDATA[var currentRecord = current; //Current GlideRecord
//Each operation input is available as a variable witin this script.
//Ex: var userName = name
var jsonObj = {};
for(var key in currentRecord){
	jsonObj[key] = currentRecord.getValue(key);
	
}
result = jsonObj;]]></u_script><u_table>global</u_table></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: u_dev_tool_operation_cc53a5722fb10110a8ce2b5df699b655
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_dev_tool_operation"><u_dev_tool_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>u_dev_tool_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-24 15:52:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>cc53a5722fb10110a8ce2b5df699b655</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Source Analysis (Relationships)</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_dev_tool_operation_cc53a5722fb10110a8ce2b5df699b655</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-29 17:28:48</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_condition/><u_conditional>false</u_conditional><u_description>Scans all target entities under a transform definition and reports the relationships between them</u_description><u_name>Source Analysis (Relationships)</u_name><u_script><![CDATA[/* 
    Title: Source Analysis Relationship Builder
    Author: Erik Anderson
    Description: Specify a transform definition and the script will go through all realationship entities and report a list of all relationships from different entities.
                 This is helpful for the summary page of the Source Analysis.
*/
var currentRecord = current; //Current GlideRecord
var transformDefinitionId = currentRecord.getUniqueValue();
var relationships = getRelationshipInfo(transformDefinitionId);
//gs.info(JSON.stringify(relationships))

result = excelReport(relationships);


function getRelationshipInfo(definitionId) {
    var returnArray = [];
    var grCIE = new GlideRecord('cmdb_inst_entity');
    grCIE.addEncodedQuery("relationship_type!=NULL");
    grCIE.addQuery("sys_rte_eb_definition", definitionId);
    grCIE.query();
    while (grCIE.next()) {
        var relationshipType = grCIE.relationship_type.getDisplayValue();
        var sys_id = grCIE.getUniqueValue();

        var fields = getEntityFields(sys_id);
        if (fields) {
            fields.relationship_type = relationshipType;
        }
        returnArray.push(fields);
    }
    return returnArray;
}


function getEntityFields(entityId) {

    var returnItem = {};
    var grSREF = new GlideRecord('sys_rte_eb_field');
    grSREF.addQuery("sys_rte_eb_entity", entityId);
    grSREF.query();
    while (grSREF.next()) {
        var field = grSREF.getValue("field");
        var entityFieldMappingGr = getFieldMapping(grSREF.getUniqueValue());
        if (entityFieldMappingGr) {

            var entityName = entityFieldMappingGr.referenced_sys_rte_eb_entity.getDisplayValue();
            entityName += " [" + entityFieldMappingGr.referenced_sys_rte_eb_entity.table + "]";
            returnItem[field] = entityName;
        }
    }
    return returnItem;
}


function getFieldMapping(entityFieldId) {
    var grSREFM = new GlideRecord("sys_rte_eb_field_mapping");
    if (grSREFM.get("target_sys_rte_eb_field", entityFieldId)) {
        return grSREFM;
    }
}


function getTableLabel(tableName) {
    var tableGr = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
    tableGr.addQuery('name', tableName);
    tableGr.query();
    if (tableGr.next()) {
        var displayName = tableGr.getValue('label');
        return displayName;
    }
}

function excelReport(relArray) {
    var str = "";
    for (var i = 0; i < relArray.length; i++) {
        var relationship = relArray[i];
        str += "\n" + relationship.parent + "\t" + relationship.child + "\t" + relationship.relationship_type;
    }
    return str;
}]]></u_script><u_table>cmdb_inst_application_feed</u_table><u_type>basic</u_type></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_267f93b32fa10110a8ce2b5df699b629
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.DevOperationScript</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>DevOperationScript</name><script><![CDATA[var DevOperationScript = Class.create();
DevOperationScript.prototype = {
    initialize: function () {
        this.functions = {};
    },

    buildExecuteScript: function (script, inputs) {
        var parameters = ['current'];
        for (var i = 0; i < inputs.length; i++) {
            parameters.push(inputs[i].inputName);
        }
        var executeFunction = this._addFunction('execute', parameters);
        executeFunction.addLine('initResult', 'var result');
        executeFunction.addLine(['script'], script);
        executeFunction.addLine('returnResult', 'return result;');
    },

    buildProcessScript: function (table, inputs, sysIds, query) {
        var processScript = this._addFunction('process');
        var inputVarStr = '';
        for (var i = 0; i < inputs.length; i++) {
            var input = inputs[i];
            var inputName = input.inputName;
            inputVarStr += ', ' + inputName;
            processScript.addLine('input_' + inputName, 'var ' + inputName + ' = ' + this._determineInputValue(input) + ';');
        }
        processScript.addLine('blank', ' ');
        processScript.addLine('grInit', "var gr = new GlideRecord('" + table + "');");
        processScript.addLine('grSysIDQuery', "gr.addQuery('sys_id','IN', '" + (sysIds || '') + "')");
        if (query) {
            processScript.addLine('grEncodedQuery', "gr.addEncodedQuery('" + query + "');");
        }
        processScript.addLine('grExecuteQuery', "gr.query()");
        processScript.addLine('grWhile', "while(gr.next())");
        var grWhileLoop = processScript.addBraceBlock('grWhileLoop');
        grWhileLoop.addLine('execute', 'var result = execute(gr' + inputVarStr + ');');
        grWhileLoop.addLine('logResult', 'gs.info(result);');
    },

    reportFunctions: function (type) {
        if (this.functions && Object.keys(this.functions).length > 0) {
            var str = "";
            for (var name in this.functions) {
                var func = this.functions[name];
                var functionStr = this._newLine();
                functionStr += this._getFunctionInit(type, name, func.parameters);
                functionStr += this._reportBlockList(func.val, 1);
                functionStr += this._newLine() + "}";
                if (type === "scriptInclude") {
                    functionStr += ",";
                }
                str += functionStr + this._newLine();
            }
            return str;
        } else {
            gs.warn("No functions have been added yet.");
        }
    },

    //Internal Functions
    _addFunction: function (name, parameters) {
        if (!this.functions[name]) {
            this.functions[name] = new this._Block("function", name);
            this.functions[name].parameters = parameters;
            return this.functions[name];
        } else {
            gs.warn("A function has already been registered under the name " + name);
        }
    },

    _newLine: function (tabs) {
        if (!tabs) {
            tabs = 0;
        }
        var str = "\n";
        for (var i = 0; i < tabs; i++) {
            str += "\t";
        }
        return str;
    },

    _getFunctionInit: function (type, functionName, parameters) {
        var str = "";
        if (type === "scriptInclude") {
            str += functionName + ": function(";
        } else {
            str += "function " + functionName + "(";
        }

        for (var i = 0; i < parameters.length; i++) {
            if (i === 0) {
                str += parameters[i];
            } else {
                str += ', ' + parameters[i];
            }
        }
        str += ") {";
        return str;
    },

    _reportBlock: function (block, tabs) {
        var blockStr = "";
        if (block.type === "line") {
            blockStr += this._newLine(tabs) + block.val;
        } else if (block.type === "ifStatement") {
            blockStr += this._newLine(tabs) + "if(" + block.statement + "){";
            blockStr += this._reportBlockList(block.val, tabs + 1);
            blockStr += this._newLine(tabs) + "}";
        } else if (block.type === "forLoop") {
            blockStr += this._newLine(tabs) + "for(var " + block.indexVariable + " = 0; " + block.indexVariable + " < " + block.arrayName + ".length; " + block.indexVariable + "++){";
            blockStr += this._reportBlockList(block.val, tabs + 1);
            blockStr += this._newLine(tabs) + "}";
        } else if (block.type === "block") {
            blockStr += this._reportBlockList(block.val, tabs);
        } else if (block.type === "braceBlock") {
            blockStr += this._newLine(tabs) + "{";
            blockStr += this._reportBlockList(block.val, tabs + 1);
            blockStr += this._newLine(tabs) + "}";
        }
        return blockStr;
    },

    _reportBlockList: function (blocks, tabs) {
        var str = "";
        for (var name in blocks) {
            var block = blocks[name];
            str += this._reportBlock(block, tabs);
        }
        return str;
    },

    _determineInputValue: function (input) {
        if (input.type === 'number') {
            return input.userValue;
        } else if (input.type === 'reference') {
            if (!this.functions['getGr']) {
                this._createGetGrFunction();
            }
            return "getGr('" + input.reference  + "','" + (input.userValue.value || '') + "')";
        } else {
            return "'" + input.userValue + "'";
        }
    },

    _createGetGrFunction: function () {
        var getGr = this._addFunction('getGr', ['table', 'sysId']);
        var checkVars = getGr.addIfStatement('checkVars', 'table && sysId');
        checkVars.addLine('initGr', "var gr = new GlideRecord(table);");
        var ifGetGr = checkVars.addIfStatement('ifGetGr', "gr.get(sysId)");
        ifGetGr.addLine('returnGr', 'return gr;');
    },

    _Block: function (type, name) {
        this.type = type;
        this.name = name;
        this.val = {};
        var newScope = new DevOperationScript();
        this.addLine = function (name, value) {
            if (!this.val[name]) {
                this.val[name] = new newScope._Block("line", name);
                this.val[name].val = value;
                return this.val[name];
            } else {
                gs.warn("A value within block " + this.name + " already has a value with the name " + name);
            }
        };

        this.addIfStatement = function (name, statement) {
            if (!this.val[name]) {
                this.val[name] = new newScope._Block("ifStatement", name);
                this.val[name].statement = statement;
                return this.val[name];
            } else {
                gs.warn("A value within block " + this.name + " already has a value with the name " + name);
            }
        };

        this.addBlock = function (name) {
            if (!this.val[name]) {
                this.val[name] = new newScope._Block("block", name);
                return this.val[name];
            } else {
                gs.warn("A value within block " + this.name + " already has a value with the name " + name);
            }
        };

        this.addBraceBlock = function (name) {
            if (!this.val[name]) {
                this.val[name] = new newScope._Block("braceBlock", name);
                return this.val[name];
            } else {
                gs.warn("A value within block " + this.name + " already has a value with the name " + name);
            }
        }

        this.addForLoop = function (name, indexVariable, arrayName) {
            if (!this.val[name]) {
                this.val[name] = new newScope._Block("forLoop", name);
                this.val[name].indexVariable = indexVariable;
                this.val[name].arrayName = arrayName;
                return this.val[name];
            } else {
                gs.warn("A value within block " + this.name + " already has a value with the name " + name);
            }
        };
    },

    type: 'DevOperationScript'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-15 17:11:01</sys_created_on><sys_id>267f93b32fa10110a8ce2b5df699b629</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DevOperationScript</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_267f93b32fa10110a8ce2b5df699b629</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-11 19:38:33</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: u_dev_tool_operation_3ce360f72f021110a8ce2b5df699b6e6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_dev_tool_operation"><u_dev_tool_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>u_dev_tool_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-26 20:15:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>3ce360f72f021110a8ce2b5df699b6e6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Copy File Into New Scope</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_dev_tool_operation_3ce360f72f021110a8ce2b5df699b6e6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-18 03:11:08</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_condition/><u_conditional>false</u_conditional><u_description>Copies all properties of the the current file to a new application scope</u_description><u_name>Copy File Into New Scope</u_name><u_script><![CDATA[var currentRecord = current; //Current GlideRecord
var targetAppGr = target_application;

if(targetAppGr){
    //Source Info
    var sourceAppGr = currentRecord.sys_scope.getRefRecord();
    var sourceScope = sourceAppGr.getValue('sys_scope');
    var sourceAppId = sourceAppGr.getUniqueValue();

    //Target Info
    var targetScope = targetAppGr.getValue('sys_scope');
    var targetAppId = targetAppGr.getUniqueValue();
    var targetClass = currentRecord.getTableName();

    var newGr = new GlideRecord(targetClass);
    newGr.initialize();
    for(var column in currentRecord){
        var value = currentRecord.getValue(column);
        if(value){
            var appIdRegExp = new RegExp(sourceAppId, 'g');
            value = value.replace(appIdRegExp, targetAppId);
            var appScope = new RegExp(sourceScope, 'g');
            value = value.replace(appScope, targetScope);
            newGr[column] =  value;
        }
    }
    var sysId = newGr.insert();
    if(sysId){
        result = newGr;
    }else{
        result = 'Something went wrong and the application file was not copied. Check the logs for additional errors.';
    }
    

}else{
    result = 'No target app specified';
}


]]></u_script><u_table>sys_metadata</u_table><u_type>basic</u_type></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_dictionary action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE" element="u_type" table="u_dev_tool_operation"><active>true</active><array>false</array><attributes/><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {

	// Add your code here
	return '';  // return the calculated value

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_0f4715f42f030110a8ce2b5df699b604
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.DevOperationCSV</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Helper class used to generate CSV formatted outputs</description><name>DevOperationCSV</name><script><![CDATA[var DevOperationCSV = Class.create();
DevOperationCSV.prototype = {
	initialize: function () {
		this.headers = [];
		this.rows = [];
		this.data = '';
	},

	addHeader: function () {
		for(var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++){
			var name = arguments[i];
			if (this.headers.indexOf(name) < 0) {
				this.headers.push(name);
			}
		}
		gs.info(this.headers);
	},

	addRow: function (obj) {
		var row = {};
		for (var i = 0; i < this.headers.length; i++) {
			var header = this.headers[i];
			if (obj && obj[header]) {
				row[header] = obj[header];
			} else if(arguments[i] && typeof arguments[i] != 'object'){
				row[header] = arguments[i];
			} else {
				row[header] = '';
			}
		}
		this.rows.push(row);
		return this.rows[this.rows.length - 1];
	},

	build: function () {
		this.data = '';
		var headerAdded = false;
		//Add Headers
		if(this.headers.length > 0){
			this.data = this._buildHeaderString();
			headerAdded = true;
		}
		//Add Body
		this.data += this._buildBodyString(headerAdded);
		return this.data;
	},

	buildDisplay: function(){
		var headerAdded = false;
		this.data = '';
		//Add Headers
		for (var i = 0; i < this.headers.length; i++) {
			headerAdded = true;
			var header = this.headers[i];
			if(i > 0){
				this.data += '\t';
			}
			this.data += header;
		}

		for(var r = 0; r < this.rows.length; r++ ){
			var row = this.rows[r];
			var rowString = '';
			if(headerAdded || r > 0){
				rowString += '\n';
			}
			var first = true;
			for(var key in row){
				if(!first){
					rowString += '\t';
				}
				first =false;
				rowString += row[key] || ''
			}
			this.data += rowString;
		}
		return this.data;
	},

	createAttachment: function(name, gr){
		var attachment = new GlideSysAttachment();

		if(!gr){
			gr = this._createPollRecord();
		}

		var fileName = name;
		if(!fileName){
			fileName = gr.getDisplayValue();
		}
		if(!fileName){
			fileName = gr.getUniqueValue() + '-' + new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue();
		}

		var sysId = attachment.write(gr, fileName + '.csv', 'text/csv', this.data);
		if(sysId){
			var attachmentGr = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
			if(attachmentGr.get(sysId)){
				return attachmentGr;
			}
		}
	},



	//Internal Functions

	_buildHeaderString: function () {
		var headerStr = '';
		for (var i = 0; i < this.headers.length; i++) {
			var header = this.headers[i];
			var cell = this._buildCell(header);
			if (!headerStr) {
				headerStr = cell;
			} else {
				headerStr += ',' + cell; 
			}
		}
		return headerStr;
	},

	_buildBodyString: function(headerAdded){
		var bodyStr = '';
		for(var i = 0; i < this.rows.length; i++){
			var row = this.rows[i];
			var rowString = '';
			if(headerAdded || i > 0){
				rowString += '\n';
			}
			if(headerAdded){
				rowString += this._buildRowString(row);
			}else{
				rowString += this._buildRowStringWithoutHeader(row);
			}
			bodyStr += rowString;
		}
		return bodyStr;
	},

	_buildRowString: function(row){
		var rowString = '';
		for (var i = 0; i < this.headers.length; i++) {
			var header = this.headers[i];
			var cell = this._buildCell((row[header] || ''));
			if(i > 0){
				rowString += ',';
			}
			rowString += cell;
		}
		return rowString;
	},


	_buildRowStringWithoutHeader: function(row){
		var rowString = '';
		for(var key in row){
			var cell = this._buildCell((row[key] || ''));
			if(rowString){
				rowString += ',';
			}
			rowString += cell;
		}
		return rowString;
	},

	_buildCell: function(val){
		if(typeof val === 'object'){
			val = JSON.stringify(val);
		}
		if(typeof val === 'string'){
			val = val.replace(/"/g, '""');
		}
		val = '"' + val + '"';
		return val;
	},

	_createPollRecord: function(){
		var pollGr = new GlideRecord('sys_poll');
		pollGr.initialize();
		pollGr.session_id = gs.getSessionID();
		pollGr.session_user = gs.getUserID();
		pollGr.state = 'complete';
		pollGr.max = '0';
		pollGr.current = '0';
		pollGr.message = 'Created by the Developer Operations DevOperationCSV Script include.';
		pollGr.insert();
		return pollGr;
	},


	type: 'DevOperationCSV'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-21 13:17:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>0f4715f42f030110a8ce2b5df699b604</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DevOperationCSV</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0f4715f42f030110a8ce2b5df699b604</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-11 19:38:33</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_dev_tool_operation"><u_dev_tool_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>u_dev_tool_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-23 14:31:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>19a873ea2f025d10a8ce2b5df699b603</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[DEBUG] - Test Operation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_dev_tool_operation_19a873ea2f025d10a8ce2b5df699b603</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-29 17:28:48</sys_updated_on><u_active>false</u_active><u_condition/><u_conditional>true</u_conditional><u_description>This is mainly used for testing new features doesnt actually do anyting.</u_description><u_name>[DEBUG] - Test Operation</u_name><u_script><![CDATA[var currentRecord = current; //Current GlideRecord

}
]]></u_script><u_table>global</u_table><u_type>list</u_type></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>

//Each operation input is available as a variable witin this script.
//Ex: var userName = name

var description = description;
currentRecord.short_description = description;
currentRecord.update();

var compString = '';
compString += "Name: " + currentRecord.getValue('name');
compString += "\nSerial Number: " + currentRecord.getValue('serial_number');

result = compString;]]></u_script><u_table>cmdb_ci_computer</u_table></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: u_dev_tool_operation_a79690912f920110a8ce2b5df699b696
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_dev_tool_operation"><u_dev_tool_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>u_dev_tool_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-16 15:02:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>a79690912f920110a8ce2b5df699b696</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Correct RTE Element Scopes</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_dev_tool_operation_a79690912f920110a8ce2b5df699b696</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-29 17:28:48</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_condition/><u_conditional>false</u_conditional><u_description>Scans over all elements related to the RTE Transform Definition and corrects any elements that my have accidently been created in the wrong scope.</u_description><u_name>Correct RTE Element Scopes</u_name><u_script><![CDATA[var currentRecord = current; //Current GlideRecord
var resultString = '';
var transform = currentRecord.getUniqueValue();
var scope = currentRecord.getValue('sys_scope');


function addLog(val){
	if(resultString){
		resultString += '\n';
	}
	resultString += 'val';
}

var grCIE = new GlideRecord('cmdb_inst_entity');
grCIE.addQuery("sys_rte_eb_definition", transform);
grCIE.addQuery("sys_scope", "!=", scope);
grCIE.orderBy('sys_scope');
grCIE.query();
while (grCIE.next()) {
	addLog('Updated cmdb_inst_entity: ' + grCIE.getDisplayValue() + ' from ' + grCIE.getValue('sys_scope') + ' to ' + scope);
    grCIE.sys_scope = scope;
    grCIE.update();
}



var grSREF = new GlideRecord('sys_rte_eb_field');
grSREF.addQuery("sys_rte_eb_definition", transform);
grSREF.addQuery("sys_scope", "!=", scope);
grSREF.orderBy('sys_scope');
grSREF.query();
while (grSREF.next()) {
	addLog('Updated sys_rte_eb_field: ' + grSREF.getDisplayValue() + ' from ' + grSREF.getValue('sys_scope') + ' to ' + scope);
    grSREF.sys_scope = scope;
    grSREF.update();
}


var grSREEM = new GlideRecord('sys_rte_eb_entity_mapping');
grSREEM.addQuery("sys_rte_eb_definition", transform);
grSREEM.addQuery("sys_scope", "!=", scope);
grSREEM.orderByDesc('sys_scope');
grSREEM.query();
while (grSREEM.next()) {
	addLog('Updated sys_rte_eb_entity_mapping: ' + grSREEM.getDisplayValue() + ' from ' + grSREEM.getValue('sys_scope') + ' to ' + scope);
    grSREEM.sys_scope = scope;
    grSREEM.update();
}


var grSREFM = new GlideRecord('sys_rte_eb_field_mapping');
grSREFM.addQuery("sys_rte_eb_definition", transform);
grSREFM.addQuery("sys_scope", "!=", scope);
grSREFM.orderBy('sys_scope');
grSREFM.query();
while (grSREFM.next()) {
	addLog('Updated sys_rte_eb_field_mapping: ' + grSREFM.getDisplayValue() + ' from ' + grSREFM.getValue('sys_scope') + ' to ' + scope);
    grSREFM.sys_scope = scope;
    grSREFM.update();
}


var grSREO = new GlideRecord('sys_rte_eb_operation');
grSREO.addQuery("sys_rte_eb_definition", transform);
grSREO.addQuery("sys_scope", "!=", scope);
grSREO.orderBy('order');
grSREO.query();
while (grSREO.next()) {
	addLog('Updated sys_rte_eb_operation: ' + grSREO.getDisplayValue() + ' from ' + grSREO.getValue('sys_scope') + ' to ' + scope);
    grSREO.sys_scope = scope;
    grSREO.update();
}

result = resultString;]]></u_script><u_table>cmdb_inst_application_feed</u_table><u_type>basic</u_type></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_c994afeb2f290110a8ce2b5df699b6e3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.DevProcessor</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>DevProcessor</name><script><![CDATA[var DevProcessor = Class.create();
DevProcessor.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},


    process: function(operation, tableName, sysIds, filter) {
        operation = JSON.parse(operation);
        sysIds = JSON.parse(sysIds);
        var controller = new DevOperationController();
        operation = controller.executeOperation(operation, tableName, sysIds, filter);
        gs.info('developer_operations (background progress worker result): ' + JSON.stringify(operation.output.results));
        //Notify User of results
		var notify = new DevOperationNotification();
        for (var i = 0; i < operation.output.results.length; i++) {
			var result = operation.output.results[i];
			if(result.type === 'link'){
				notify.postSimpleNotificationToUser(gs.getUserID(), result.result.gr, operation.name, 'Operation Completed Click To View Results', result.gr.displayValue);
			}else if(result.type === 'basic'){
                notify.postSimpleNotificationToUser(gs.getUserID(), operation.output.scriptExecutionGr, operation.name, 'Operation Completed Click To View The Execution History');
            }	
        }
    },

    //Internal Functions


    type: 'DevProcessor'

sys_update_xml.name: u_dev_tool_operation_7b61be0a2f310110a8ce2b5df699b63b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_dev_tool_operation"><u_dev_tool_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>u_dev_tool_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-22 13:39:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>7b61be0a2f310110a8ce2b5df699b63b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Source Analysis (Single Column)</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_dev_tool_operation_7b61be0a2f310110a8ce2b5df699b63b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-29 17:28:48</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_condition/><u_conditional>false</u_conditional><u_description>Scans the transform definition based on a list of entites specified in the entity list array.  Returns a tab delimited string that can be pasted into an excel sheet.</u_description><u_name>Source Analysis (Single Column)</u_name><u_script><![CDATA[/* 
    Title: Source Analysis Builder For Entities
    Author: Erik Anderson
    Description: Scans the transform definition based on a list of entites specified in the entity list array. 
                 Logs out a tab delimited string that can be pasted into an excel sheet.
*/

/////////////////////////////////////
////Script Configuration Settings////
/////////////////////////////////////
var currentRecord = current; //Current GlideRecord
var createCSV = create_csv;
//Definition of the parent RTE transform which references all contained entities
var transformDefinitionId = currentRecord.getUniqueValue();

//The max number of rows to search for sample data before giving up
var searchLimit = 100;

//////////////////////////////////////
//////////Processing Logic////////////
//////////////////////////////////////

var csv = new DevOperationCSV();
csv.addHeader('Native File/Table', 'Native Column Header', 'Sample Data', 'NOW Table','NOW Attribute', 'Reference', 'Referenced	Invalid Value Check', 'Transform', 'Comments')
//var reportString = '\nNative File/Table' + '\t' +	'Native Column Header' + '\t' +	'Sample Data' + '\t' +	'NOW Table	NOW Attribute' + '\t' +	'Reference' + '\t' +	'Referenced	Invalid Value Check' + '\t' +	'Transform' + '\t' +	'Comments';
var importEntityId = '';
var importEntityTableName = '';
var importEntityGr = searchForImportEntity();
if(importEntityGr){
    importEntityId = importEntityGr.getUniqueValue();
    importEntityTableName = importEntityGr.getValue('table');
}


var entityList = getTargetEntities();
//gs.info(JSON.stringify(entityList))
for(var i = 0; i <entityList.length; i++){
    var currentEntity = entityList[i];
        var entityGr = getEntity(currentEntity.id);
        var entity = getEntitySourceInfo(entityGr);
        //gs.info(JSON.stringify(entity))
        excelReportEntity(entity);
}
if(createCSV){
    csv.build();
    result = csv.createAttachment(currentRecord.getValue('name') + ' Source Analysis');
}else{
    result = csv.buildDisplay();
}



function getTargetEntities(){
    var entityList = [];
    var entityGr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_inst_entity');
    entityGr.addQuery('sys_rte_eb_definition', transformDefinitionId);
    entityGr.addEncodedQuery('table!=NULL^relationship_type=NULL^path!=NULL');
    entityGr.query();
    while (entityGr.next()) {
       entityList.push({
           name: entityGr.getValue('name'),
           id: entityGr.getUniqueValue(),
           table: entityGr.getValue('table'),
       });
    }
    return entityList;
}



function getEntitySourceInfo(entityGr) {
    if (entityGr) {
        var entity = {};
        entity.name = entityGr.getValue('name');
        entity.id = entityGr.getUniqueValue();
        entity.table = entityGr.getValue('table');

        entity.fields = getEntityFields(entityGr.getUniqueValue());
        entity.relationships = getEntityRelationships(entityGr.getUniqueValue());
    

        // gs.info(JSON.stringify(entity))
        return entity;
    } else {
        gs.info('No entity Glide Record provided.');
    }
}




function excelReportRelationships(relationships) {
    //var relationshipString = '\nRelationships';
    csv.addRow('Relationships');
    for (var i = 0; i < relationships.length; i++) {
        var relationship = relationships[i];
        excelReportFields(relationship.inverseEntityFields);
        //relationshipString += relFields;
    }
    //return relationshipString;
}


function getEntity(entityId) {
    var entityGr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_inst_entity');
    if (entityGr.get(entityId)) {
        return entityGr;
    }
}

function searchForImportEntity(){
    var entityGr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_inst_entity');
    entityGr.addQuery('sys_rte_eb_definition', transformDefinitionId);
    entityGr.addQuery('name', 'Import');
    entityGr.query();
    if(entityGr.next()){
        return entityGr;
    }
}


function getEntityRelationships(entityId) {
    var returnFields = [];
    if (entityId) {
        var fieldMapsGr = getReferenceFieldMapping(entityId);
        if (fieldMapsGr && fieldMapsGr.hasNext()) {
            while (fieldMapsGr.next()) {
                var entityMap = fieldMapsGr.getValue('sys_rte_eb_entity_mapping');

                var inverseEntity = getInverseFieldMap(entityMap, fieldMapsGr.getUniqueValue());
                if (inverseEntity) {
                    var relationshipType = fieldMapsGr.target_sys_rte_eb_field.sys_rte_eb_entity.relationship_type.getDisplayValue();
                    var field = fieldMapsGr.target_sys_rte_eb_field.field + '';
                    var inverseEntityFields = getEntityFields(inverseEntity, 'source_native_key');
                    var relEntityObj = {
                        relationshipType: relationshipType,
                        field: field,
                        inverseEntityFields: inverseEntityFields
                    };
                    returnFields.push(relEntityObj);

                } else {
                    gs.info('Couldn\'t find an inverse field map for under map id: ' + entityMap);
                }
            }
        } else {
            gs.info('No reference entity maps found.');
        }
    } else {
        gs.info('No entityId provided to the getEntityRelationships function');
    }
    return returnFields;
}

function getInverseFieldMap(entityMapId, notFieldMapId) {
    var entityFieldMapGr = new GlideRecord('sys_rte_eb_field_mapping');
    entityFieldMapGr.addEncodedQuery('sys_rte_eb_entity_mapping.sys_id=' + entityMapId + '^sys_id!=' + notFieldMapId);
    entityFieldMapGr.addQuery('sys_rte_eb_entity_mapping', entityMapId);
    entityFieldMapGr.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', notFieldMapId);
    entityFieldMapGr.query();
    if (entityFieldMapGr.next()) {
        return entityFieldMapGr.getValue('referenced_sys_rte_eb_entity');
    }
}



function getReferenceFieldMapping(entityId) {
    var entityFieldMapGr = new GlideRecord('sys_rte_eb_field_mapping');
    entityFieldMapGr.addQuery('referenced_sys_rte_eb_entity', entityId);
    entityFieldMapGr.query();
    return entityFieldMapGr;
}


function getEntityFields(entityId, fieldName, passThroughOps) {
    var ignoreOps;
    if(Array.isArray(passThroughOps)){
        ignoreOps = true;
    }
    var returnArray = [];
    var fieldGr = new GlideRecord('sys_rte_eb_field');
    fieldGr.addQuery('sys_rte_eb_entity', entityId);
    if(fieldName){
        fieldGr.addQuery('name', fieldName);
    }
    fieldGr.query();
    while (fieldGr.next()) {
        var operations;
        if(!Array.isArray(passThroughOps)){
            operations = [];
        }else{
            operations = passThroughOps;
        }
        
        var targetField = {};
        targetField.sourceEntity = fieldGr.sys_rte_eb_entity.getDisplayValue();
        targetField.name = fieldGr.getValue('name');
        targetField.id = fieldGr.getUniqueValue();
        targetField.table = fieldGr.sys_rte_eb_entity.table + '';
        targetField.sourceFields = findSourceEntityFields([targetField.id], operations);
        if(!ignoreOps){
            targetField.operations = operations;
        }
        returnArray.push(targetField);
    }
    return returnArray;
}

function findSourceEntityFields(fieldIds, operations) {
    var sourceFields = [];
    if (fieldIds && fieldIds.length) {
        for (var i = 0; i < fieldIds.length; i++) {  
            var field = getEntityField(fieldIds[i]);
            if (field) {
                if (field.entityId === importEntityId) {
                    field.sampleValue = findExampleValue(field.name);
                    sourceFields.push(field);
                } else {
                    var foundFields = findSourceEntityField(field, operations);
                    if (foundFields) {
                        sourceFields = sourceFields.concat(foundFields);
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    } else {
        gs.info('No field IDs provided')
    }
    return sourceFields;
}




function findSourceEntityField(field, operations) {
    if (field) {
        var operationSourceFields = findSourceOperationField(field, operations);
        if (operationSourceFields && operationSourceFields.length) {
            return findSourceEntityFields(operationSourceFields, operations);
        }
        var entityFieldMapSource = findEntityFieldMapSource(field, operations);
        //gs.info(JSON.stringify(entityFieldMapSource))
        if (entityFieldMapSource) {
            if (Array.isArray(entityFieldMapSource)) {
                return entityFieldMapSource;
            } else {
                return findSourceEntityFields([entityFieldMapSource], operations)
            }

        }
    } else {
        gs.info('No field provided');
    }
}

function findEntityFieldMapSource(field, operations) {
    var fieldMapGr = new GlideRecord('sys_rte_eb_field_mapping');
    fieldMapGr.addQuery('target_sys_rte_eb_field', field.id);
    fieldMapGr.query();
    //target_sys_rte_eb_field.sys_id=1a589059db9720508d736a5f0596199e
    if (fieldMapGr.next()) {
        var sourceId = fieldMapGr.getValue('source_sys_rte_eb_field');
        if (sourceId) {
            return sourceId;
        }
        var referenceEntity = fieldMapGr.getValue('referenced_sys_rte_eb_entity');
        if (referenceEntity) {
            return getEntityFields(referenceEntity, 'source_native_key', operations);
        }
    }

}

function findSourceOperationField(field, operations) {
    var entityOperation = new GlideRecord('sys_rte_eb_operation');
    entityOperation.addQuery('sys_rte_eb_definition', transformDefinitionId);
    entityOperation.addQuery('sys_rte_eb_entity', field.entityId);
    entityOperation.addEncodedQuery('target_sys_rte_eb_field=' + field.id + '^ORtarget_sys_rte_eb_fieldsLIKE' + field.id);
    entityOperation.query();
    if (entityOperation.next()) {
        var operation = {
            name: entityOperation.getValue('name'),
            type: entityOperation.type.getDisplayValue()
        }
        operations.unshift(operation);
        var sourceField = entityOperation.getValue('source_sys_rte_eb_field');
        if (sourceField) {
            return [sourceField];
        }
        var sourceFields = entityOperation.getValue('source_sys_rte_eb_fields');
        if (sourceFields) {
            return sourceFields.split(',');
        }
    }
}

function getEntityField(fieldId) {
    var fieldGr = new GlideRecord('sys_rte_eb_field');
    if (fieldGr.get(fieldId)) {
        var returnObj = {};
        returnObj.name = fieldGr.getValue('name');
        returnObj.id = fieldGr.getUniqueValue();
        returnObj.entityId = fieldGr.getValue('sys_rte_eb_entity');
        return returnObj;
    } else {
        gs.info('Couldnt find an entity field with id: ' + fieldId);
    }
}

function findDictionaryLabel(columnName, tableName) {
    var dictionaryGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    dictionaryGr.addQuery('name', tableName);
    dictionaryGr.addQuery('element', columnName);
    dictionaryGr.query();
    if (dictionaryGr.next()) {
        return dictionaryGr.getValue('column_label');
    } else {
        gs.info('Could not find dictionary record named ' + columnName + ' in table ' + tableName);
    }
}


function flattenObjectClean(object, returnObj, stack) {
    if (!returnObj) {
        returnObj = {};
    }
    var originalStack = stack;
    for (var key in object) {
        if (!originalStack) {
            stack = key.toLowerCase();
        } else {
            stack = originalStack + '_' + key.toLowerCase();
        }
        var element = object[key];
        var type = typeof element;
        if (type === 'object') {
            if (Array.isArray(element)) {
                returnObj[stack + '_json'] = JSON.stringify(element);
            } else {
                returnObj = this.flattenObjectClean(element, returnObj, stack);
            }
        } else {
            returnObj[stack] = element;
        }
    }

    return returnObj;
}



//Excel Report Functions
function excelReportEntity(entity) {
    //var reportString = ''
    //reportString += '\n' + entity.name;
    csv.addRow(entity.name)
    excelReportFields(entity.fields);
    excelReportRelationships(entity.relationships);
    
}

function excelReportFields(entityFields) {
    for (var i = 0; i < entityFields.length; i++) {
        var field = entityFields[i];
        var fieldName = field.name;
        var table = field.table;
       
        var sourceObj = getSourceFieldInfo(field.sourceFields);
        var operations = getOperationInfo(field.operations);

        sourceObj.fields = cleanseFieldsString(sourceObj.fields);
        //build report string line
        csv.addRow('', sourceObj.fields, sourceObj.sampleValues, table, fieldName, sourceObj.referenceField, sourceObj.referenceTable, '', operations)
        //reportString += '\n\t' + sourceObj.fields + '\t' + sourceObj.sampleValues + '\t' + table + '\t' + fieldName + '\t' + sourceObj.referenceField + '\t' + sourceObj.referenceTable + '\t\t' + operations;
    }
}

function getOperationInfo(operations){
    var operationString = '';
    for(var i = 0; i < operations.length; i++){
        if(i === 0){
            operationString = operations[i].type;
        }else{
            operationString += ' & ' + operations[i].type;
        }
    }
    return operationString;
}

function getSourceFieldInfo(sourceFields) {
    var returnObj = {
        fields: '',
        referenceTable: '',
        referenceField: ''
    };
    for (var i = 0; i < sourceFields.length; i++) {
        var sourceField = sourceFields[i];
        if (sourceField.sourceFields) {
            returnObj.referenceTable = sourceField.table;
            returnObj.referenceField = sourceField.name;
            var sourceObj = getSourceFieldInfo(sourceField.sourceFields);
            returnObj.fields = sourceObj.fields;
            returnObj.sampleValues = sourceObj.sampleValues;
        } else {
            if (i === 0) {
                returnObj.sampleValues = sourceField.sampleValue;
                returnObj.fields = sourceField.name;
            } else {
                returnObj.sampleValues += ' & ' + sourceField.sampleValue;
                returnObj.fields += ' & ' + sourceField.name
            }
        }
    }
    return returnObj;
}

function cleanseFieldsString(fields){
    if(fields){
        // fields = 'object' + fields
        // fields = fields.replace(/\&/g, '& object');
        // fields = fields.replace(/\./g, '');
        // fields = fields.replace(/\[\*\]/g, '');
        fields = 'object > ' +fields;
        fields = fields.replace(/\&/g, '& object > ');
        fields = fields.replace(/\./g, ' > ');
        fields = fields.replace(/\[\*\]/g, '');
    } 
    
    return fields;
}
// End Excel Report Functions

//Start Example Value Search

function findExampleValue(fieldName){
    if(importEntityTableName && fieldName){
        var stagingGr = new GlideRecord(importEntityTableName);
        stagingGr.orderByDesc('sys_created_on');
        stagingGr.query();
        var intCount = 0;
        while(stagingGr.next()){
            if(intCount > searchLimit){
                return;
            }
            intCount++;
            var data = stagingGr.getValue('u_data');
            if(data){
                data = JSON.parse(data);
                var stack = fieldName.split('.');
                var val = findValueInObj(0, stack, data);
                if(!gs.nil(val)){
                    return val;
                }
            }
        }
        //ip_addresses[*].addresses_value
    }
}

function findValueInObj(index, stack, obj){
    var key = stack[index];
    if(key.indexOf('[*]') > -1){
        key = key.replace('[*]', '');
        if(Array.isArray(obj[key])){
            return findValueInArray(index+1, stack, obj[key]);
        }
    }else{
        if(obj[key]){
            if(typeof obj[key] === 'object' && stack[index + 1]){
                findValueInObj(index + 1, stack, obj[key]);
            }else{
                return obj[key];
            }
        }
    }
}

function findValueInArray(index, stack, array){
    if(Array.isArray(array)){
        for(var i = 0; i < array.length; i++){
            var obj = array[i];
            var val = findValueInObj(index, stack, obj);
            if(!gs.nil(val)){
                return val;
            }
        }
    }
}]]></u_script><u_table>cmdb_inst_application_feed</u_table><u_type>basic</u_type></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_dev_tool_operation"><u_dev_tool_operation action="DELETE"><sys_class_name>u_dev_tool_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-27 14:40:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>0ca524762f874110a8ce2b5df699b699</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Test CSV</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_dev_tool_operation_0ca524762f874110a8ce2b5df699b699</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-02 12:57:04</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_condition/><u_conditional>false</u_conditional><u_description/><u_name>Test CSV</u_name><u_script><![CDATA[var currentRecord = current; //Current GlideRecord

var csv = new DevOperationCSV();
csv.addHeader('name', 'age', 'coolness', 'description', 'some object');

var row = csv.addRow();
row.name = 'Erik Anderson';
row.age = 27;
row.coolness = 'wicked';
row.description = 'Some guy';
row['some object'] = {
    hello: 'hi',
    hello2: 'whatsup'
};


csv.build();
result = csv.createAttachment('Test_' + new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue());]]></u_script><u_table>global</u_table></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: u_dev_tool_operation_df5f62af2fa50110a8ce2b5df699b66d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_dev_tool_operation"><u_dev_tool_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>u_dev_tool_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-14 19:02:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>df5f62af2fa50110a8ce2b5df699b66d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Deep Search Application</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_dev_tool_operation_df5f62af2fa50110a8ce2b5df699b66d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-29 17:28:48</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_condition/><u_conditional>false</u_conditional><u_description>Scan application records over each column for a match on a set search phrase</u_description><u_name>Deep Search Application</u_name><u_script><![CDATA[/* 
    Title: Deep search application
    Author: Erik Anderson
    Description: Searches an applications metadata files and scans each column for a loose match on a search phrase.
*/
var applicationId = current.getUniqueValue();
var searchPhrase = searchPhrase;

var outputString = "";
var resultCounts = 0;

gs.info("Searching Scope: " + applicationId + " for containments of " + searchPhrase);
run(applicationId, searchPhrase);
gs.info(outputString);
gs.info("Search Completed found " + resultCounts + " matching records.");

var res = "\nSearching Scope: " + applicationId + " for containments of " + searchPhrase;
res += "\n" + outputString;
res +="\n" + "Search Completed found " + resultCounts + " matching records.";

result = res;

function run(scope, search) {
    search = search.toLowerCase();
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_metadata');
    gr.addQuery('sys_scope', scope);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var table = gr.sys_class_name + '';
        var acutalRecord = getAcutalRecord(gr.getUniqueValue(), table);
        for (var key in acutalRecord) {
            if (acutalRecord.getValue(key) && acutalRecord.getValue(key).toLowerCase().indexOf(search) > -1) {
                resultCounts++;
                outputString += "\n"+ table + ' : ' + gr.getDisplayValue() + ' : ' + gr.getUniqueValue() + '\n' + gr.getLink();
                //gs.info(table + ' : ' + gr.getDisplayValue() + ' : ' + gr.getUniqueValue());
            }
        }
    }
}

//Gets the glide record for a specific table vs the sys_metadata table;
function getAcutalRecord(sysId, table) {
    var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
    if (gr.get(sysId)) {
        return gr;
    }
}
]]></u_script><u_table>sys_scope</u_table><u_type>basic</u_type></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_dev_tool_operation"><u_dev_tool_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>u_dev_tool_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-20 17:39:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>9d5b45682f070110a8ce2b5df699b682</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Reprocess Staging Record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_dev_tool_operation_9d5b45682f070110a8ce2b5df699b682</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-29 17:28:48</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_condition/><u_conditional>true</u_conditional><u_description/><u_name>Reprocess Staging Record</u_name><u_script><![CDATA[var currentRecord = current; //Current GlideRecord
var tableName = current.getValue('sys_class_name');
var scope = getScope();
var columns = getColumns();

if(tableName && scope && columns.length > 0){
    var newStagingGr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
    newStagingGr.initialize();
    for(var i = 0; i < columns.length; i++){
        var column = columns[i];
        newStagingGr[column] = stagingGr.getValue(column);
    }
    result = newStagingGr.insert();
}
//Each operation input is available as a variable witin this script.
//Ex: var userName = name

//Enter Code Below





function getScope(){
    var tableGr = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
    if(tableGr.get('name', tableName)){
        return tableGr.getValue('sys_scope');
    }
}

function getColumns(){
    var columns = [];
    var grSD = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    grSD.addQuery('name', table);
    grSD.addQuery('sys_scope', scope);
    grSD.query();
    while (grSD.next()) {
        var column = grSD.getValue('element');
        if(column && !column.startsWith('sys')){
            columns.push(column);
        }
    }
    return columns;
}]]></u_script><u_table>sys_import_set_row</u_table><u_type>basic</u_type></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_a7cf8a6a2f210110a8ce2b5df699b6d1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.DevOperationOutput</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>DevOperationOutput</name><script><![CDATA[var DevOperationOutput = Class.create();
DevOperationOutput.prototype = {
    initialize: function(scriptExecutionGr) {
        this.results = [];
        this.duration = {};

        if(scriptExecutionGr){
            if(typeof scriptExecutionGr === "string"){
                scriptExecutionGr = this._getGlideRecordWithId(scriptExecutionGr);
            }
			if(scriptExecutionGr + "" === "[object GlideRecord]"){
				this.setFromGr(scriptExecutionGr);
			}else if(scriptExecutionGr + "" === "[object Object]"){
				this.setFromModel(scriptExecutionGr);
			}
		}

    },

    setStartTime: function(){
        this.duration.start = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValueInternal();
		this.started = new GlideDateTime();
    },

    setEndTime: function(){
        this.duration.end = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValueInternal();
		this.finished = new GlideDateTime();
    },
    setEndTimeAsync: function(){
        var gdt = new GlideDateTime();
        gdt.addDaysLocalTime(1);
        this.duration.end = gdt.getDisplayValueInternal();
    },

    addResult: function(type, status, result, gr){
        this.results.push({
			'type': type,
            'status': status,
            'result': result,
            'gr': {
                sysId: gr.getUniqueValue(),
                displayValue: gr.getDisplayValue()
            }
        });
    },
    

    setFromGr: function(scriptExecutionGr){
		this.sysId = scriptExecutionGr.getUniqueValue();
        var result = scriptExecutionGr.getValue("results")
        if(result){
            this.result = JSON.parse(result);
        }else{
            this.result = '';
        }
		this.executedBy = this._getReferenceField("executed_by", scriptExecutionGr);
        if(scriptExecutionGr.getValue("started")){
            this.started = new GlideDateTime(scriptExecutionGr.getValue("started"));
            this.duration.start = this.started.getDisplayValueInternal();
        }else{
            this.started = '';
        }
        if(scriptExecutionGr.getValue("finished")){
            this.finished = new GlideDateTime(scriptExecutionGr.getValue("finished"));
            this.duration.end = this.finished.getDisplayValueInternal();
        }else{
            this.finished = '';
        }
		this.script = scriptExecutionGr.getValue("script");
	},

    setFromModel: function(model){
		for(var key in model){
			this[key] = model[key];
		}
	},
	
    insertScriptExecution: function(){
		var scriptExecutionGr = new GlideRecord("sys_script_execution_history");
		scriptExecutionGr.initialize();
		scriptExecutionGr = this._assignGlideRecordValues(scriptExecutionGr);
		this.sysId = scriptExecutionGr.insert();
        this.scriptExecutionGr = scriptExecutionGr;
	},

    updateScriptExecution: function(){
        var scriptExecutionGr = new GlideRecord("sys_script_execution_history");
		if(scriptExecutionGr.get(this.sysId)){
			scriptExecutionGr = this._assignGlideRecordValues(scriptExecutionGr);
			scriptExecutionGr.update();
		}
    },

	//Internal Functions
	
    _getReferenceField: function(columnName, scriptExecutionGr){
		var returnObj = {};
		if(columnName){
			returnObj.id = scriptExecutionGr.getValue(columnName);
			returnObj.displayValue = scriptExecutionGr.getDisplayValue(columnName);
		}
		return returnObj;
	},

    _assignGlideRecordValues: function(scriptExecutionGr){
		scriptExecutionGr.result = JSON.stringify(this.results);
		scriptExecutionGr.executed_by = gs.getUserID();
		scriptExecutionGr.started = this.started;
		scriptExecutionGr.finished = this.finished;
		scriptExecutionGr.script = this.script;
        return scriptExecutionGr;
	},

    type: 'DevOperationOutput'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-11 14:10:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>a7cf8a6a2f210110a8ce2b5df699b6d1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DevOperationOutput</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a7cf8a6a2f210110a8ce2b5df699b6d1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-29 17:28:48</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
