sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_dev_tool_operation"><u_dev_tool_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>u_dev_tool_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-23 14:22:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>6c95f72a2f4a1d10a8ce2b5df699b65f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Generate Class Script Include</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_dev_tool_operation_6c95f72a2f4a1d10a8ce2b5df699b65f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-29 17:28:48</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_condition/><u_conditional>false</u_conditional><u_description>Use the current form to generate a standardized script include with basic CRUD operations for this table.</u_description><u_name>Generate Class Script Include</u_name><u_script><![CDATA[var DevOperationClassGenerator = Class.create();
DevOperationClassGenerator.prototype = {
    initialize: function(tableName, view, targetScopeGr) {
		gs.info(tableName + ' : ' + view);
		if(tableName){
			this.tableName = tableName;
			this.view = view;
            if(targetScopeGr){
                this.targetApplicationId = targetScopeGr.getUniqueValue();
            }else{
                this.targetApplicationId = gs.getCurrentApplicationId();
            }
			var tableGr = this._getTableGlideRecord(this.tableName);
			this._tableHierarchy = this._getTableHierarchy(this.tableName);
			var formElements = this._getFormFields();
			this._addTypesToColumns(formElements);
			this.tableColumns = this._addInternalNames(formElements);
			gs.info(JSON.stringify(this.tableColumns));
			
			this.tableLabel = tableGr.getValue("label");
			this.className = this.tableLabel.replace(/ /g, "");
			this.glideRecordName = this._generateGlideRecordName(tableGr.getValue("label"));
		}
		
    },

    insertNewScriptIncludeClass: function() {
        var scriptIncludeGr = new GlideRecord("sys_script_include");
        scriptIncludeGr.initialize();
        scriptIncludeGr.name = this.className;
        scriptIncludeGr.script = this._baseTemplate;
        scriptIncludeGr.sys_scope = this.targetApplicationId;
        scriptIncludeGr.insert();
        return scriptIncludeGr;
    },


    addClassInfo: function() {
        this._baseTemplate = this._baseTemplate.replace(/{{ClassName}}/g, this.className);
        this._baseTemplate = this._baseTemplate.replace(/{{GlideRecordName}}/g, this.glideRecordName);
        this._baseTemplate = this._baseTemplate.replace(/{{TableName}}/g, this.tableName);
    },

    addSetters: function() {
        var setterString = "";
        for (var i = 0; i < this.tableColumns.length; i++) {
            var column = this.tableColumns[i];
            var setter = this._getSetterTempalte(column.name, column.type);
            if (i === 0) {
                setterString += "this." + column.internalName + " = " + setter;
            } else {
                setterString += "\n\t\tthis." + column.internalName + " = " + setter;
            }
        }
        this._baseTemplate = this._baseTemplate.replace(/{{SetScript}}/g, setterString);
    },

    addGlideRecordAssign: function() {
        var grAssignString = "";
        for (var i = 0; i < this.tableColumns.length; i++) {
            var column = this.tableColumns[i];
            if (i > 0) {
                grAssignString += "\n\t\t";
            }
            if (column.type === "reference") {
                grAssignString += this.glideRecordName + "." + column.name + " = this." + column.internalName + ".sysId;";
            } else {
                grAssignString += this.glideRecordName + "." + column.name + " = this." + column.internalName + ";";
            }
        }
        this._baseTemplate = this._baseTemplate.replace(/{{AssignGlideRecordScript}}/g, grAssignString);
    },



    //Internal Functions

    _getFormFields: function() {
		var returnArray = [];
        var uiElementGr = new GlideRecord('sys_ui_element');
        uiElementGr.addQuery("sys_ui_section.name", this.tableName);
        if (!this.view) {
            uiElementGr.addQuery("sys_ui_section.view", "Default view");
        } else {
            uiElementGr.addQuery("sys_ui_section.view.name", this.view);
        }
        uiElementGr.addQuery("type", "");
        uiElementGr.query();
        while (uiElementGr.next()) {
			returnArray.push({
				name: uiElementGr.getValue('element')
			});
        }
		return returnArray;
    },

	_addTypesToColumns: function(columns){
		for(var i = 0; i < columns.length; i++){
			var column = columns[i];
			var columnGr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
			columnGr.addEncodedQuery(this._generateTableNameQuery());
			columnGr.addQuery("element", column.name);
			columnGr.setLimit(1);
			columnGr.query();
			if(columnGr.next()){
				column.type = columnGr.internal_type.name + "";
			}
		}
	},
	
	_generateTableNameQuery: function(){
		var str = "";
		for(var i = 0;  i < this._tableHierarchy.length; i++){
			if(i === 0){
				str = "name="+ this._tableHierarchy[i];
			}else{
				str += "^ORname=" + this._tableHierarchy[i];
			}
		}
		return str;
	},
	
    _generateGlideRecordName: function() {
        var name = "gr";
        var indexedName = this.tableLabel.split(" ");
        for (var i = 0; i < indexedName.length; i++) {
            name += indexedName[0][0].toUpperCase();
        }
        return name;
    },

    _addInternalNames: function(formElements) {
        for (var i = 0; i < formElements.length; i++) {
            formElements[i].internalName = this._camelcaseColumn(formElements[i].name);
        }
        return formElements;
    },

    _camelcaseColumn: function(columnName) {
        var nameArray = columnName.split("_");
        var internalName = "";
        for (var i = 0; i < nameArray.length; i++) {
            if (nameArray[0] === "u") {
                continue;
            }
            if (!internalName) {
                internalName += nameArray[i];
            } else {
                internalName += nameArray[i].charAt(0).toUpperCase() + nameArray[i].slice(1);
            }
        }
        return internalName;
    },

    _getSetterTempalte: function(columnName, columnType) {
        var template = "";
        if (columnName && columnType) {
            if (this._setterTemplates[columnType]) {
                template = this._setterTemplates[columnType];
            } else {
                template = this._setterTemplates["Default"];
            }
            template = template.replace(/{{ColumnName}}/g, columnName);
            template = template.replace(/{{GlideRecordName}}/g, this.glideRecordName);
            return template;
        }
    },

    _getTableGlideRecord: function(tableName) {
        var tableGr = new GlideRecord("sys_db_object");
        if (tableGr.get("name", tableName)) {
            return tableGr;
        }
    },
	
	_getTableHierarchy: function(tableName){
		var table = new TableUtils(tableName);
		return table.getTables();
	},

    _setterTemplates: {
        "boolean": '({{GlideRecordName}}.getValue("{{ColumnName}}") == "1");',
        "integer": 'parseInt({{GlideRecordName}}.getValue("{{ColumnName}}"));',
        "reference": 'this._getReferenceField("{{ColumnName}}", {{GlideRecordName}});',
        "Default": '{{GlideRecordName}}.getValue("{{ColumnName}}");'
    },

    _baseTemplate: 'var {{ClassName}} = Class.create();\n{{ClassName}}.prototype = {\n    initialize: function({{GlideRecordName}}) {\n\t\tif({{GlideRecordName}}){\n            if(typeof {{GlideRecordName}} === "string"){\n                {{GlideRecordName}} = this._getGlideRecordWithId({{GlideRecordName}});\n            }\n\t\t\tif({{GlideRecordName}} + "" === "[object GlideRecord]"){\n\t\t\t\tthis.setFromGr({{GlideRecordName}});\n\t\t\t}else if({{GlideRecordName}} + "" === "[object Object]"){\n\t\t\t\tthis.setFromModel({{GlideRecordName}});\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n    },\n\t\n\tsetFromGr: function({{GlideRecordName}}){\n\t\tthis.sysId = {{GlideRecordName}}.getUniqueValue();\n\t\t{{SetScript}}  \n\t},\n\n\tsetFromModel: function(model){\n\t\tfor(var key in model){\n\t\t\tthis[key] = model[key];\n\t\t}\n\t},\n\n\tinsert: function(){\n\t\tvar {{GlideRecordName}} = new GlideRecord("{{TableName}}");\n\t\t{{GlideRecordName}}.initialize();\n\t\t{{GlideRecordName}} = this._assignGlideRecordValues({{GlideRecordName}});\n\t\tthis.sysId = {{GlideRecordName}}.insert();\n\t},\n\t\t\n\tupdate: function(){\n\t\tvar {{GlideRecordName}} = new GlideRecord("{{TableName}}");\n\t\tif({{GlideRecordName}}.get(this.sysId)){\n\t\t\t{{GlideRecordName}} = this._assignGlideRecordValues({{GlideRecordName}});\n\t\t\t{{GlideRecordName}}.update();\n\t\t}\n\t},\n\n\tdeleteRecord: function(){\n\t\tvar {{GlideRecordName}} = new GlideRecord("{{TableName}}");\n\t\tif({{GlideRecordName}}.get(this.sysId)){\n\t\t\t{{GlideRecordName}}.deleteRecord();\n\t\t}\n\t},\n\n\t//Internal Functions\n\t\n\t_getReferenceField: function(columnName, {{GlideRecordName}}){\n\t\tvar returnObj = {};\n\t\tif(columnName){\n\t\t\treturnObj.id = {{GlideRecordName}}.getValue(columnName);\n\t\t\treturnObj.displayValue = {{GlideRecordName}}.getDisplayValue(columnName);\n\t\t}\n\t\treturn returnObj;\n\t},\n\n\t_assignGlideRecordValues: function({{GlideRecordName}}){\n        {{AssignGlideRecordScript}}\n        return {{GlideRecordName}};\n\t},\n\n    _getGlideRecordWithId: function(id){\n        var {{GlideRecordName}} = new GlideRecord("{{TableName}}");\n        if({{GlideRecordName}}.get(id)){\n            return {{GlideRecordName}};\n        }\n    },\n\t\t\t\t\n    type: \'{{ClassName}}\'\n};',

    type: 'DevOperationClassGenerator'
};

var currentRecord = current; //Current GlideRecord
var currentView = view; //Current form view (Default View will be empty)
var tableName = currentRecord.getTableName();
var targetScopeGr = target_app_scope;

var classGenerator = new DevOperationClassGenerator(tableName, currentView, targetScopeGr);
classGenerator.addClassInfo();
classGenerator.addSetters();
classGenerator.addGlideRecordAssign();
var scriptIncludeGr = classGenerator.insertNewScriptIncludeClass();

result = scriptIncludeGr;



]]></u_script><u_table>global</u_table><u_type>basic</u_type></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_260e9f192f690110a8ce2b5df699b6e1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.DevOperationController</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>DevOperationController</name><script><![CDATA[var DevOperationController = Class.create();
DevOperationController.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    getOperations: function(tableName, sysIds, type, filter) {
        if(type === 'basic'){
            return this.getBasicOperations(tableName, sysIds);
        }else if(type === 'list'){
            var operations = this.getListOperations(tableName, filter);
            operations =  operations.concat(this.getBasicOperations(tableName, sysIds));
            return operations
        }
    },

    getBasicOperations: function(tableName, sysIds) {
        if (!tableName || !sysIds || sysIds.length == 0) {
            return [];
        }
        var grArray = this._getTargetGlideRecords(tableName, sysIds);
        var operationArray = [];
        var operationGr = new GlideRecord('u_dev_tool_operation');
        operationGr.addQuery('u_active', true);
        operationGr.addQuery('u_type', 'basic');
        operationGr.query();
        while (operationGr.next()) {
            var operation = new DevOperation(operationGr);
            for (var i = 0; i < grArray.length; i++) {
                operation.isRecordCompatible(grArray[i]);
            }
            if (operation.recordCount.valid > 0 && operation.isTableCompatible(tableName)) {
                operationArray.push(operation);
            }
        }
        return operationArray;
    },

    getListOperations: function(tableName, filter) {
        if (!tableName) {
            return [];
        }
        var operationArray = [];
        var operationGr = new GlideRecord('u_dev_tool_operation');
        operationGr.addQuery('u_active', true);
        operationGr.addQuery('u_type', 'list');
        operationGr.query();
        while (operationGr.next()) {
            var operation = new DevOperation(operationGr);
            if(!operation.isTableCompatible(tableName)){
                continue;
            }
            operation.isFilterCompatible(tableName, filter);
            if (operation.recordCount.valid > 0) {
                operationArray.push(operation);
            }
        }
        return operationArray;
    },

    executeOperation: function(selectedOperation, tableName, sysIds, filter, view, async) {

        var operation = new DevOperation(selectedOperation);
        if (async) {
            operation.executeAsync(tableName, sysIds, filter, view);
        } else {
            var recordGr;
            if(operation.type === 'basic'){
                recordGr = this._getGlideRecordStream(tableName, sysIds);
            }else if(operation.type === 'list'){
                recordGr = this._getListGideRecordStream(tableName, filter, operation.condition);
            }
            operation.execute(recordGr, view);
        }
        return operation;
    },

    generateScript: function(selectedOperation, tableName, sysIds, view) {
        var operation = new DevOperation(selectedOperation);
        var generatedScript = operation.getImplementationScript(sysIds, tableName)
        return generatedScript;
    },


    //Internal Function

    _getGlideRecordStream: function(tableName, sysIds) {
        var recordGr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
        var query;
        for (var i = 0; i < sysIds.length; i++) {
            var id = sysIds[i];
            if (i === 0) {
                query = recordGr.addQuery('sys_id', id);
            } else {
                query.addOrCondition('sys_id', id);
            }
        }
        recordGr.query();
        return recordGr;
    },

    _getTargetGlideRecords: function(tableName, sysIds) {
        var grArray = [];
        for (var i = 0; i < sysIds.length; i++) {
            var recordGr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
            if (recordGr.get(sysIds[i])) {
                grArray.push(recordGr);
            }
        }
        return grArray;
    },

    _getListGideRecordStream: function(tableName, filter, operationFilter){
        var recordGr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
        if(filter){
            recordGr.addEncodedQuery(filter);
        }
        if(operationFilter){
            recordGr.addEncodedQuery(operationFilter);
        }
        recordGr.query();
        return recordGr;
    },

    type: 'DevOperationController'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-07 22:40:00</sys_created_on><sys_id>260e9f192f690110a8ce2b5df699b6e1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DevOperationController</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_260e9f192f690110a8ce2b5df699b6e1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-29 17:28:48</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: u_dev_tool_operation_3c98cc152f520110a8ce2b5df699b65b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_dev_tool_operation"><u_dev_tool_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>u_dev_tool_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-16 14:00:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>3c98cc152f520110a8ce2b5df699b65b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Modified Files</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_dev_tool_operation_3c98cc152f520110a8ce2b5df699b65b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-29 17:28:48</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_condition/><u_conditional>false</u_conditional><u_description>Searches sys_metadata files for any New/Changed application files. This is useful to run before submitting a patch to ensure no files were accidentily added or changed.</u_description><u_name>Get Modified Files</u_name><u_script><![CDATA[var appGr = current;
var versionOverride = version_override;
var changedFiles = getChangedRecords(appGr, versionOverride);
//result = reportChangedFiles(changedFiles);
result = generateCSVReport(changedFiles, appGr, versionOverride);




function reportChangedFiles(changedFiles) {
    var reportString = "Updated On\tDisplay\tTable\tState\tRecord\tPrevious Version\tCompare";
    for (var i = 0; i < changedFiles.length; i++) {
        var file = changedFiles[i];
        var compareLink = '';
        if (file.versionSysId) {
            compareLink = generateLink('/merge_form_current_version.do?sysparm_version_id=' + file.versionSysId);
        }
        reportString += "\n" + file.updated + "\t" + file.display + "\t" + file.table + "\t" + file.state + "\t" + generateLink(file.link) + "\t" + generateLink(file.previousVersion) + "\t" + compareLink;
    }
    return reportString;
}

function generateCSVReport(changedFiles, appGr, versionOverride) {
    var csv = new DevOperationCSV();
    csv.addHeader('Updated On', 'Display', 'Table', 'State', 'Record', 'Previous Version', 'Compare');
    for (var i = 0; i < changedFiles.length; i++) {
        var file = changedFiles[i];
        var row = csv.addRow();
        row['Updated On'] = file.updated + '';
        row['Display'] = file.display;
        row['Table'] = file.table;
        row['State'] = file.state;
        row['Record'] = generateLink(file.link);
        row['Previous Version'] = generateLink(file.previousVersion);
        var compareLink = '';
        if (file.versionSysId) {
            compareLink = generateLink('/merge_form_current_version.do?sysparm_version_id=' + file.versionSysId);
        }
        row['Compare'] = compareLink;
    }

    csv.build();
    var version = appGr.getValue('version');
    if (versionOverride) {
        version = versionOverride;
    }
    var fileName = appGr.getValue('name') + ' Changes Since ' + version;
    return csv.createAttachment(fileName);

}

function generateLink(url) {
    if (url) {
        return gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + 'nav_to.do?uri=/' + url;
    } else {
        return '';
    }

}

function getChangedAppFiles(versionCreateGdt, appGr) {
    var serializer = new GlideRecordXMLSerializer();
    var changedFiles = [];
    if (!versionCreateGdt || !appGr) {
        gs.info('No versionCreateGdt or appGr was specified');
        return false;
    }
    var metadataGr = new GlideRecord('sys_metadata');
    metadataGr.addQuery('sys_scope', appGr.getUniqueValue());
    metadataGr.addQuery('sys_updated_on', '>=', versionCreateGdt);
    metadataGr.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on');
    metadataGr.query();
	gs.info("Potentially Changed Files: " + metadataGr.getRowCount());
    while (metadataGr.next()) {
        var tableName = metadataGr.getValue('sys_class_name');
        var recordGr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
        if (recordGr.get(metadataGr.getUniqueValue())) {
            var current = {};
            var currentPayload = serializer.serialize(recordGr) + '';
            var isDeleted = false;
            if (tableName === 'sys_metadata_delete') {
				tableName = recordGr.getValue('sys_db_object');
                if (recordGr.sys_audit_delete) {
                    currentPayload = recordGr.sys_audit_delete.payload + '';
                } else if (recordGr.sys_update_version) {
                    currentPayload = recordGr.sys_update_version.payload + '';
                }
                isDeleted = true;
            }
            currentPayload = currentPayload.replace(//g, '\r');
            currentPayload = gs.xmlToJSON(currentPayload);
            currentPayload = getPrimaryObject(currentPayload, tableName);
            if (isDeleted && new GlideDateTime(currentPayload.sys_created_on) > versionCreateGdt) {
                continue;
            }
            current.display = currentPayload.sys_name;
            current.table = currentPayload.sys_class_name;

            current.link = recordGr.getLink();
            var updatedOnGdt = new GlideDateTime(recordGr.getValue('sys_updated_on'));
            current.updated = updatedOnGdt.getDisplayValue();
            var createdOnGdt = new GlideDateTime(currentPayload.sys_created_on);
            if (createdOnGdt > versionCreateGdt && isDeleted) {
                continue;
            } else if (createdOnGdt > versionCreateGdt) {
                current.state = 'NEW';
            } else if (isDeleted) {
                current.state = 'DELETE';
            } else {
                current.state = 'UPDATE';
                var versionGr = getPreviousVersion(tableName, recordGr.getUniqueValue(), versionCreateGdt);
                if (versionGr) {
                    current.versionSysId = versionGr.getUniqueValue();
                    current.previousVersion = versionGr.getLink();
                    var prevPayload = versionGr.getValue('payload');
                    prevPayload = prevPayload.replace(//g, '\r');
                    prevPayload = gs.xmlToJSON(prevPayload);
                    prevPayload = getPrimaryObject(prevPayload, tableName);
                    var changedFields = findChangedFields(currentPayload, prevPayload);
                    if (changedFields.length > 0) {
                        current.state = 'UPDATE';
                    } else {
                        current.state = 'UPDATE_NO_CHANGE';
                    }
                    current.changedFields = changedFields;
                }
            }
            changedFiles.push(current);
        }
    }
    return changedFiles;
}

function findChangedFields(currentPayload, prevPayload) {
    var changedFields = [];
    if (!currentPayload || !prevPayload) {
        return changedFields;
    }
    for (var key in currentPayload) {
        if (key.startsWith('sys_')) {
            continue;
        }

        var prevValue = prevPayload[key];
        var currentValue = currentPayload[key];
        if (typeof currentValue === 'object' && currentValue.content) {
            currentValue = currentValue.content;
            prevValue = prevValue.content;
        }

        if (currentValue != prevValue) {
            changedFields.push({
                "field": key,
                "prevValue": prevValue,
                "currentValue": currentValue
            });
        }
    }
    return changedFields;
}

function getChangedRecords(appGr, versionOverride) {
    var updatedOn = getLastAppVersion(appGr, versionOverride);
    var version = appGr.getValue('version');
    gs.info('Version: ' + version);
    gs.info('Version Create Time: ' + updatedOn);
    return getChangedAppFiles(updatedOn, appGr);
}


function getPreviousVersion(table, sysId, versionCreateGdt) {
    var versionGr = new GlideRecord('sys_update_version');
    versionGr.addQuery('name', table + '_' + sysId);
    versionGr.addQuery('sys_created_on', '<=', versionCreateGdt);
    versionGr.orderByDesc('sys_created_on');
    versionGr.query();
    if (versionGr.next()) {
        return versionGr;
    }
}

function getLastAppVersion(appGr, versionOverride) {
    var currentVersion = appGr.getValue('version');
    if (versionOverride) {
        currentVersion = versionOverride;
    }
    var versionGr = getVersions('sys_app', appGr.getUniqueValue());
    var lastSysUpdatedOn;
    var trace = false;
    while (versionGr.next()) {
        var xml = versionGr.getValue('payload');
        var versionObj = getObj(xml);
        if (versionObj) {
            var oldVersion = versionObj.version;
            if (oldVersion == currentVersion) {
                trace = true;
            }
            if (currentVersion != oldVersion && trace === true) {
                return lastSysUpdatedOn;
            } else {
                lastSysUpdatedOn = versionObj.sys_updated_on;
            }
        }
    }
    return lastSysUpdatedOn;
}

function getVersions(table, sysId) {
    var versionGr = new GlideRecord('sys_update_version');
    versionGr.addQuery('name', table + '_' + sysId);
    versionGr.orderByDesc('sys_recorded_at');
    versionGr.query();
    return versionGr;
}

function getObj(xml) {
    var helper = new XMLHelper(xml);
    var obj = helper.toObject();
    var table = obj['@table'];
    if (table) {
        return obj[table];
    }
}

function getPrimaryObject(currentPayload, tableName) {
    var keys = Object.keys(currentPayload);
    currentPayload = currentPayload[keys[0]];
    if (keys[0] === 'record_update') {
		return getSubObject(currentPayload, tableName);
		
        //var table = currentPayload.table;
//         if (currentPayload[tableName]) {
// 		return currentPayload[tableName];
// 	} else {
// 		keys = Object.keys(currentPayload);
// 		currentPayload = currentPayload[keys[0]];
// 		if (currentPayload[tableName]) {
// 			return currentPayload[tableName];
// 		}else{
// 			return currentPayload;
// 		}
// 	}
    } else {
        return currentPayload;
    }
}

function getSubObject(currentPayload, tableName){
	if (currentPayload[tableName]) {
		currentPayload = currentPayload[tableName];
		
		if(Array.isArray(currentPayload)){
			return currentPayload[currentPayload.length - 1];
		}
		
		if(!currentPayload.sys_created_on){
			return getSubObject(currentPayload, tableName);
		}else{
			return currentPayload;
		}
	} else {try{
		keys = Object.keys(currentPayload);
		return getSubObject(currentPayload[keys[0]], tableName);
	}catch(e){
		gs.info('ERROR: ' + tableName + currentPayload);
	}
		
	}
}


]]></u_script><u_table>sys_app</u_table><u_type>basic</u_type></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_2dbdbed82f650110a8ce2b5df699b60b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.DevOperationInput</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>DevOperationInput</name><script><![CDATA[var DevOperationInput = Class.create();
DevOperationInput.prototype = {
    initialize: function(inputGr) {
		if(inputGr){
            if(typeof inputGr === "string"){
                inputGr = this._getGlideRecordWithId(inputGr);
            }
			if(inputGr + "" === "[object GlideRecord]"){
				this._setFromGr(inputGr);
			}else if(inputGr + "" === "[object Object]"){
				this._setFromModel(inputGr);
			}
		}
    },

	getUserValue: function(){
		var userValue = this.userValue;
		if(userValue && this.type === 'reference'){
			var gr = new GlideRecord(this.reference);
			if(gr.get(userValue.value)){
				userValue = gr;
			}
		}
		return userValue || '';
	},
	
	//Internal Functions
	
	_setFromGr: function(inputGr){
		this.sysId = inputGr.getUniqueValue();
		this.inputLabel = inputGr.getValue("u_input_label");
		this.inputName = inputGr.getValue("u_input_name");
		this.type = inputGr.getValue("u_type");
		this.maxLength = parseInt(inputGr.getValue("u_max_length"));
		this.sysScope = this._getReferenceField("sys_scope", inputGr);
		this.active = (inputGr.getValue("u_active") == "1");
		this.reference = inputGr.getValue('u_reference');
		this.reference_display = inputGr.getValue("u_reference_display_field");
		this.qualifier = inputGr.getValue("u_qualifier");
		this.choiceList = this._organizeChoiceList(inputGr.getValue("u_choice_list"));
		this.mandatory = (inputGr.getValue("u_mandatory") == "1");
		this.userValue = '';
	},

	_setFromModel: function(model){
		for(var key in model){
			this[key] = model[key];
		}
		
	},
	
	_getReferenceField: function(columnName, inputGr){
		var returnObj = {};
		if(columnName){
			returnObj.value = inputGr.getValue(columnName);
			returnObj.displayValue = inputGr.getDisplayValue(columnName);
		}
		return returnObj;
	},

    _getGlideRecordWithId: function(id){
        var inputGr = new GlideRecord("u_dev_tool_operation_input");
        if(inputGr.get(id)){
            return inputGr;
        }
    },
	
	_organizeChoiceList: function(choiceList){
		if(!choiceList){
			return [];
		}
		var choiceArray = [];
		choiceList = JSON.parse(choiceList);
		for(var key in choiceList){
			choiceArray.push({
				name: key,
				value: choiceList[key]
			});
		}
		return choiceArray;
	},
				
    type: 'DevOperationInput'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-04 17:44:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>2dbdbed82f650110a8ce2b5df699b60b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DevOperationInput</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2dbdbed82f650110a8ce2b5df699b60b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-11 19:38:33</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_1d9f17182f57111003377f572799b614
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.DevOperationNotification</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>DevOperationNotification</name><script><![CDATA[var DevOperationNotification = Class.create();
DevOperationNotification.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    postSimpleNotificationToUser: function(userId, gr, title, description, priority) {
        if (!userId || !title || !gr) {
            return;
        }
		var template = new this.NotificationTemplate();
        template.displayValue = title;
        template.changes.short_description.displayValue = description;
        template.changes.description.displayValue = description;
        template.changes.priority.displayValue = priority;

        var uiNotificationGr = new GlideRecord('ui_notification_inbox');
        uiNotificationGr.initialize();
        uiNotificationGr.route = this.agentWorkspaceRouteId;
        uiNotificationGr.payload = JSON.stringify(template);
        uiNotificationGr.recipient = userId;
        uiNotificationGr.target_table = gr.getTableName();
        uiNotificationGr.target = gr.getUniqueValue();
        uiNotificationGr.triggered_by = gs.getUserID();

        return uiNotificationGr.insert();
    },
	
	agentWorkspaceRouteId: 'cb1af195872023002941b53046cb0b4e',
	NotificationTemplate: function(){
			this.displayValue= "",
			this.changes = {
				"short_description": {
					"displayValue": "",
					"fieldLabel": "Short description",
					"previousValue": "",
					"value": ""
				},
				"description": {
					"displayValue": "",
					"fieldLabel": "Description",
					"previousValue": "",
					"value": ""
				},
				"priority": {
					"displayValue": "",
					"fieldLabel": "Priority",
					"previousValue": "",
					"value": ""
				},
				"assigned_to": {
					"displayValue": "",
					"fieldLabel": "Assigned to",
					"previousValue": null,
					"value": null
				}
			},
			this.tableLabel = "",
			this.operation = ""
	},



    type: 'DevOperationNotification'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-17 16:19:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>1d9f17182f57111003377f572799b614</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DevOperationNotification</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1d9f17182f57111003377f572799b614</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-18 03:11:08</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: u_dev_tool_operation_3719d0912f920110a8ce2b5df699b6b9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_dev_tool_operation"><u_dev_tool_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>u_dev_tool_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-16 15:09:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>3719d0912f920110a8ce2b5df699b6b9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Accept All Remote Change on Update Set</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_dev_tool_operation_3719d0912f920110a8ce2b5df699b6b9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-18 03:11:08</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_condition table="sys_remote_update_set">state=previewed^EQ<item display_value="Previewed" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="previewed"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></u_condition><u_conditional>true</u_conditional><u_description>Goes go through any update set conflicts and set the status to ignored of the preview problems to ignore.</u_description><u_name>Accept All Remote Change on Update Set</u_name><u_script><![CDATA[var currentRecord = current; //Current GlideRecord
var updateSetId = currentRecord.getUniqueValue();
var updateCount = 0;
var current = new GlideRecord('sys_update_preview_problem');
current.addQuery('remote_update_set', updateSetId);
current.addQuery('status', '');
current.addQuery('description', 'Found a local update that is newer than this one');
current.query();
while (current.next()) {
    var ppa = new GlidePreviewProblemAction(gs.action, current);
    ppa.ignoreProblem();
	updateCount++;
}

result = 'Successfully ignored ' + updateCount + ' conflicts.';]]></u_script><u_table>sys_remote_update_set</u_table><u_type>basic</u_type></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Accept All Remote Change on Update Set

	var inputName = current.getValue('u_input_name');
	if(inputName.indexOf(' ') > -1){
		inputName = inputName.replace(/ /g, '_');
	}
	current.u_input_name = inputName;

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-15 17:21:27</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>400e27b42f564110a8ce2b5df699b6b4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Enforce No Space On Input Name</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_400e27b42f564110a8ce2b5df699b6b4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-11 19:38:33</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=400e27b42f564110a8ce2b5df699b6b4"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_dev_tool_operation"><u_dev_tool_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>u_dev_tool_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-15 02:11:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>0754822f2f4b1d1003377f572799b628</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Skip All Conflicting Remote Updates</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_dev_tool_operation_0754822f2f4b1d1003377f572799b628</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-18 03:11:08</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_condition table="sys_remote_update_set">state=previewed^EQ<item display_value="Previewed" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="previewed"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></u_condition><u_conditional>true</u_conditional><u_description>Bulk skip remote updates that are conflicting with what is currently on the platform.</u_description><u_name>Skip All Conflicting Remote Updates</u_name><u_script><![CDATA[var currentRecord = current; //Current GlideRecord
var updateSetId = currentRecord.getUniqueValue();
var updateCount = 0;
var current = new GlideRecord('sys_update_preview_problem');
current.addQuery('remote_update_set', updateSetId);
current.addQuery('status', '');
current.addQuery('description', 'Found a local update that is newer than this one');
current.query();
while (current.next()) {
    var ppa = new GlidePreviewProblemAction(gs.action, current);
    ppa.ignoreProblem();
	updateCount++;
	var ppa = new GlidePreviewProblemAction(action, current);
	ppa.skipUpdate();
}

result = 'Successfully accepted ' + updateCount + ' conflicts.';]]></u_script><u_table>sys_remote_update_set</u_table><u_type>basic</u_type></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: u_dev_tool_operation_d3908c3a2f425d10a8ce2b5df699b619
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_dev_tool_operation"><u_dev_tool_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>u_dev_tool_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-23 15:07:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>d3908c3a2f425d10a8ce2b5df699b619</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Generate SysId System Property</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_dev_tool_operation_d3908c3a2f425d10a8ce2b5df699b619</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-29 17:28:48</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_condition/><u_conditional>false</u_conditional><u_description>Create a system property that represents the sys_id of this record.</u_description><u_name>Generate SysId System Property</u_name><u_script><![CDATA[var currentRecord = current; //Current GlideRecord
var targetAppGr = target_app_scope;

//Enter Code Below
var displayValue = currentRecord.getDisplayValue();
var cleanDisplayValue = _cleanDisplayValue(displayValue);
var propName = _buildPropertyName(cleanDisplayValue, targetAppGr);
if(_isValidPropertyName("name", propName)){
    result = _buildSystemProperty(propName, currentRecord.getUniqueValue() , "The sys_id of the "+ displayValue +" Record", targetAppGr.getUniqueValue());
}else{
    result =  "A system property already exists with the name: " + propName;
}


function _cleanDisplayValue(displayValue){
    if(displayValue){
        displayValue =  displayValue.toLowerCase();
        displayValue = displayValue.replace(/ /g, "_");
        displayValue += '_sys_id';
        return displayValue;
    }
    
}


function _buildPropertyName(name, targetAppGr){
    var targetScope = targetAppGr.getValue('scope');
    if(targetScope  === "global"){
        return name;
    }else{
        return targetScope + "." + name;
    }
}

function _isValidPropertyName(column, name){
    var sysPropertyGr = new GlideRecord("sys_properties");
    if(sysPropertyGr.get(column, name)){
        return false;
    }else{
        return true;
    }
}

function _buildSystemProperty(name, value, description, targetAppId){
    if(name){
        var sysPropertyGr = new GlideRecord("sys_properties");
        sysPropertyGr.initialize();
        sysPropertyGr.name = name;
        sysPropertyGr.value = value;
        sysPropertyGr.description = description;
        sysPropertyGr.sys_scope = targetAppId;
        sysPropertyGr.ignore_cache = true;
        sysPropertyGr.insert();
        return sysPropertyGr;
        
    }
    
}]]></u_script><u_table>sys_metadata</u_table><u_type>basic</u_type></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>
